title: Expansive windows, Extra cabinetry for storage
posting_body: Welcome Home to Eight Eighty Eight
888 Apartments offers luxury residences on 18 floors with stunning territorial views of downtown Bellevue, Cascade and Olympic mountains.
Enjoy detailed designer finishes like custom closets and undermount cabinet lighting in every home.
Hotel-inspired amenities include a 19th floor rooftop deck, yoga studio, business center and dog run, to name a few.
With an angled design and boutique floor plans, your new home has been maximized for spacious, city living at its finest.
Use this link for more information:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 765 Sq.
- Backlit mirror with dimmer and inset digital clock display in bathroom
- Warm and cool tone color palettes alternating by floor
- Custom pendant lighting over kitchen island*
- Ample storage in fridges with pull-out freezer on bottom
- Pull out garbage under the sink
- Seamless Carrera Marble inspired stone countertops*
- Carrara marble inspired quartz counter tops*
- Special cabinet beneath your kitchen sink for sponge
- Seamless solid stone backsplash in kitchen
- Floor to ceiling windows on floor 18*
- Ceiling lights in the bedrooms and living rooms
- Roam dog run & pet relief area
- 8 guest parking spots on top level
- Trash and recycle chute on every floor
- The Escape lounge with fireplace and dining room seating
Please contact leasing office for full list of potentially restricted breeds.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
